idea-plugin.name: PIT mutation testing Idea plugin
idea-plugin.description:
IntelliJ IDEA plugin for PIT mutation testing (http://pitest.org).
Tested with PIT 0.29

Adds a 'Run configuration' that allows to execute PIT within IDE.

Usage: Run->Edit Configurations->Defaults->Pit Runner

Dependency to PIT must be added to the tested project: org.pitest:pitest:0.29
